attributes.action: Create an extra 1 pence income tax to be used ONLY for the NHS
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We the undersigned would like a 1p Tax to be paid from our wages (on every £10 that we earn) to be paid to improve our health service and NOT to fund any other government projects.This money is in addition to what the government already ploughs into the service and not instead of that money.
We are fed up of having sub-standard care and demand that you improve it ! Bring back the old system where nurses ran the wards, not admin staff and they were clean and people cared whether you lived or died.

reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
